mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.*,ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT M.*,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members) FROM members M where id not in('admin') ORDER BY join_date DESC)T) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(sysdate-2, 'yyyymmdd') and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
select count(*) from members where gender = #{gender}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.*,ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT M.*,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members) FROM members M where to_char(join_date, 'yyyymmdd' ) between to_char(sysdate-2, 'yyyymmdd') and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY join_date DESC)T) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
select count(*) from members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyymmdd')
select count(*) from members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate-2, 'yyyymmdd')
select SP.*,R.r_name,R.r_price from safepay SP join reward R on R.r_no = SP.r_no where SP.id = #{id} order by sp_no desc
update members set is_blockmember = 'Y' where id = #{id}
update members set is_blockmember = 'N' where id = #{id}
